notes.title: Authors’ Contribution
notes.p: All authors materially participated in the research. Dr. Spuntarelli, Dr. Luciani, Dr. Bentivegna, Dr. Marini, and Dr. Falangone participated in data collection, study design, and article preparation. Prof. Martelletti, Dr. Conforti, and Dr. Rachele participated in acquisition of patient’s data.
All authors have approved the final article.
